title: Roman Ubakivi
text:
Roman Ubakivi (born 24 March 1945) is an <a href="Estonia">Estonia</a>n former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and coach. He founded the youth team Lõvid () for ethnic Estonian players and coached the <a href="Estonia%20national%20football%20team">Estonia national football team</a> from 1994 to 1995. His former pupils include national team <a href="List%20of%20men%27s%20footballers%20with%20100%20or%20more%20international%20caps">centurions</a> <a href="Marko%20Kristal">Marko Kristal</a>, <a href="Mart%20Poom">Mart Poom</a> and <a href="Martin%20Reim">Martin Reim</a>.
Honours.
Individual.
 5th Class <a href="Order%20of%20the%20Estonian%20Red%20Cross">Order of the Estonian Red Cross</a>
